title: The Artist Corner
description: Delog, a GatsbyJS and Netlify CMS starter for Designers and Developers

home.title: Welcome to the Artist Corner!
home.description: On this website we focus on the world of art! The aim of this site is to help artist display the work they have completed without paying a premium charge for display on a site. If you would like to recommend an artist to be displayed on here click the phrase in the top right or the button below. New artists work will be added as recommendations fill up and are contacted. Each work will be for sale, the contact information is given for the artist's work.
